content: Premium Bench Saw Blade Premium diamond silent blade reduces noise by up to 50% – designed for cutting masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to balance higher cutting performance with a longer blade lifetime Noise-reducing blade design Applications Cutting brick and block ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Bench saws Arbor size: 1 in Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Tool type | Bench saws | Base material | Concrete, Masonry, Natural stone | Arbor size | 1 in | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Segment height | 9 mm | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 427187 - Masonry blade DS-BB 14 x .125/1 M1-CP - Package Size 1 pc - 427186 - Masonry blade DS-BB 14 x .125/1 N1-CP - Package Size 1 pc - 427188 - Masonry blade DS-BB 20 x .125/1 M1-CP - Package Size 1 pc - 427189 - Masonry blade DS-BB 20 x .125/1 C1-CP - Package Size 1 pc
